formatted_address: Blk 205 Hougang St 21, #02-02 Heartland Mall, Singapore 530205
name: A-One Signature @ Heartland Mall

reviews.text: Lots of variety and it was all rather yummy! The best was the eggplant with salted fish and salted egg pork ribs. The omelette rice was okay (rice could be more flavourful) and the prawns were juicy (but vermicelli was a bit bland). Good service!

I had a great experience dining here! The food was prepared very quickly, and I appreciated the free appetizers and dessert—it was a lovely touch. The staff were all polite, friendly, and patient, which made the atmosphere even more enjoyable. The food itself tasted very fresh and delicious. I would definitely love to come back again!

The tofu was fairly quite enjoyable. However, the beancurd skin prawn could use some refinement, as the portion size of the beancurd skin prawn seemed quite small compared to the vegetables. The fish soup was a bit on the salty and oily side, with a slight hint of reused oil. As for the noodles, they reminded me of a local zi char style, which was decent but could be elevated further. The porridge was not too bad. Overall, there’s potential for improvement, and I look forward to seeing how the dishes evolve!

Recently went to dine at A-One and had a great experience! We were greeted with a warm and friendly experience not to mention it was clean and comfortable which is perfect for a relaxing meal.

Menu has tons of options and I went with lobsters of their current promotion which are affordable and fresh! I also tried their signature claypot rice which did not disappoint as well. Definitely impressive

Would recommend for a tasty meal. Great food , service and atmosphere. Will definitely be coming back.

We ordered the Set for two at Kovann Mall.
Food is good. Ingredients fresh Food portion adequate.Taste is flavorful. We enjoyed the lunch.
(Photo only two dishes shown. Beancurd half eaten not in picture. Pork also eaten)
